Often times we click shows/movies to see whether or not we are interested and then click out and it ends up showing there which makes it very hard to navigate through Netflix!! Thanks in adamant for help on this issue.

title: Doesn't load
review: I have an older iPad. I've been using it to view Netflix for about 2 years now. Up until about a week ago I was able to watch Netflix on it. Now, I cannot. The app started to load, then it crashed. I tried to load it again, and it crashed. I powered down, powered up, and tried to reload Netflix. It still crashed. It did an automatic update about 3 days ago. Can't you people test your apps on older platforms before you release it. Your big enough. I hate it that apps are only tested on the newest platforms, assuming it will work on older platforms, and disregarding long time customers. My iPad has a newer iOS than 9.0.

title: Change of policy
review:
Netflix has always been a source of great entertainment. Their shows are unparalleled in quality and they strive to have something for everyone. However, one of the greatest joys was families being able to share this, and college kids who maybe have a tight budget could all share this.

The industry has now been flooded with everyone wanting their own streaming service now, fighting over rights and titles. Most people will not pay for all the various subscriptions.

Amongst this level of competition Netflix has become more greedy with their policies. First raising prices all the time making it the most expensive service, and then again “cracking down” on password sharing.

I cancelled my service. If I cannot share something with my friends and family it is not worth paying for. I hope others will follow my lead so Netflix realizes how foolish, greedy, and sleazy this move really is.

title: Useless once a quarter for reasons passing understanding
review:
Just removed this app from my Fire TV.  Why?  Because yet again the app is not working properly on this device.  The episode video doesn’t play but 10 minutes of the audio plays.  Uninstalled and reinstalled and it’s still useless.  If this keeps happening, I am happy to find somewhere else to spend the $20/month or however much it is to use this service on my phone instead of the TV.

Removing it from FireTV.  AGAIN!!!!  Why? Same crap, different day.  Watching a show on a 6 inch screen is not quality, Netflix!

title: Rollercoaster updates, not in a fun way
review:
Overall, it’s a good app.

That said, the updates are *really* inconsistent. It seems that every other update completely removes My List (as in ‘click the link and get an empty page with a suggestion that you start adding shows’) and the Continue Watching section. Then, hopefully, the next update returns them. It’s a real rollercoaster with Netflix. 

After the most recent update, both My List and Continue... are MIA. I’ve gotten to the point where I seriously hesitate to update the app just in case it will remove those sections. 

There’s also the eternal problem with Netflix showing you stuff their algorithm decides you would like, while making it a real chore finding the things you actually want. But, that’s a problem with almost all streaming services.

title: Everything but the...
review: I love Netflix. Truly. I have one complaint and it is only apparent on the mobile app. I love that you can download movies and shows for the viewer on the go, but I’m disappointed by the accessibility of the downloads in the app. The download section has a plethora of shows and movies, which is nice, but when you go into the downloads category it shows listings that can’t be downloaded. Please fix! Will change to 5 stars after this is fixed.

title: On Screen Controls Are Perfect
review: Very glad they added the 10 second forward & back buttons as well as the ability to double tap the screen for them. I feel like this is something they used to have in the past, but I’m glad to have them again/now. This will increase my willingness to watch Netflix on my iPhone or iPad as the experience is now much more comfortable.

title: Love it but...
review: I love the Netflix app and the fact that you can download shows to watch wherever you go, however I do want to be able to download the tv show Friends. Friends is a hilarious tv show but I can’t watch it wherever I want because I can’t download the show. I know it is a small thing but I feel that lots of people besides myself would download the show if that option was available.

title: Somewhat disappointing
review: There is a ton to watch, but nothing compared to what it was 5-6 years ago. A lot of crap and many not-so-good Netflix originals. There are quite a few binge-worthy shows and enough movies to keep you entertained for a while. A recent update on the mobile app also dropped the synopsis of movies/shows and replaced them with ‘search tags’ (ie an actor’s name or other key adjectives). Worst update ever IMO. How do I decide if I want to watch a movie from six mostly unrelated words? Could be better but worth the $10/month I guess.

title: Meh Now
review: I really liked the update before, where you could double tap the sides to rewind or fast-forward, but after it’s been taken off, I feel like it’s a huge downgrade. It was such a handy feature and efficient to not even have to tap the screen first to show the toolbar thing, and now I have to get used to the old, not as good, way of rewinding. I also feel like removing the fast-forward was a mistake too. Overall, I’m kinda disappointed by the most recent update because I was really enjoying the new layout.

title: Can’t watch downloads via airplay!
review: Whenever I try to play my downloads through airplay it doesn’t work! Everything is up to date and every other app works through airplay. I can’t stream videos because of my internet so my only option is to watch my downloads. It’s really frustrating that I am stuck having to watch on my tiny phone. It’s not even worth having Netflix at this point. Apparently this has been an issue for a while and for many many other people, so please fix this!!

title: it’s ok
review: the app is great and all... but it’s taking away all the good movies, making me not want to use the app anymore. 🤷🏽‍♀️ also Netflix takes absolutely forever to update new series and new movies, i see movies that are really good but from, maybe 1990’s. for example, a movie called “The Princess Bride” a wonderful movie in my opinion and many other peoples too, but it isn’t up there. they are taking down shows and movie that people love to see. i think there should be a section to ask the Netflix company to add new shows and movies, get people opinions and more options for movies and shows.

title: Add new stuff if it’s possible
review: You see, I watch Netflix a lot 2 years ago and i loved it. Especially the anime section. So i got my own personal account now and was wondering if they had new anime. Apparently I didn’t see any. Crunchyroll is out doing y’all even though they just got anime and drama. And its low price unlike this. Good graphics and can watch on unlimited devices without paying much. Update Netflix more with new stuff. Become an all standing all rounder. The main thing i was looking for was the maze runner series. Add the movie plz

title: What is happening
review: I don't know if anyone has had this same issue or if it's just a problem with my device, but since the most recent January update Netflix seems to have gone crazy. I tried to use the app before updating, but it would crash every time. And when I tried to update, even the update wouldn't work. Now I have an icon for the app permanently waiting to update, but I deleted the app. This is by far the strangest thing I've seen this app do.

title: Skip forward button
review: There are some things I really enjoy watching but it seems like i do a lot of browsing around the titles too.  I lose interest in shows because it takes so long between seasons. For the app itself,  I wish they would put the pause/play button in the middle of the screen and add a skip forward button and skip intro too.  Keep basic things like “my list” and “continue watching “ in the same place so i don’t have to search for it.  Bring back the star ratings.

title: Desperately Need a RATING FILTER!!!
review:
Please add rating filter to the search engine - most families need G or PG rated shows & movies. 

We’ve stop using Netflix & will probably cancel membership unless a ratings filter becomes available. 

We don’t watch anything MA or R. We watch G & PG shows & movies that actually have plots that are thought provoking & w/o gratuitous sex, nudity, profanity, graphic violence, graphic medical scenes - which doesn’t advance plots just revolts most of us.

There’s a much better way to handle violent bloody scenes - watch the movie “Return to Me” where the wife is in a car accident in the very beginning.

The director / screen writer wisely choose to only show the brief ER shot to communicate what happened & elegantly advanced the plot w/o showing a grisly accident or graphic bloody details!!!

Netflix, you can be better than what you currently have morphed into. Bring back shows like Mr Monk & Father Brown & The like that a wider inter generational demographic can enjoy & employ our critical thinking skills in the process!

Will update if warranted...

title: Netflix
review: It’s an amazing app ever since I got it like 3 or 4 years ago an I really love it I love everything about it nothing needs to be changed or anything it’s just in a really amazing and I highly recommend it but the only issue I have is one time I try to cancel my subscription and I can’t find out how I could do that so it took the money off my card and I had a overdraft on my card so yeah I don’t know how please tell me how to cancel this subscription thank you

title: Disappointed
review: I signed up for Netflix and promptly forgot the password. I think I messed up one letter/number while creating the password without realizing it. I tried to reset the password but had trouble when I needed to remember the old password first. So I called customer service. After one hour on the phone with them I still did not have a new password. I could not log in on any of my other devices. Well the device I was logged in  did not transfer the log in credentials when I upgraded it. So now I can’t get in at all. I liked Netflix but had to cancel the account. I am very upset because I have till Dec 19 before the feee trial ends.

title: Plays well but search often does not find the title or anything related.
review:
As players go it does play videos and the audio is synchronized.  However this programs search feature is terrible.  

One example of the search came up recently:  a search for “even cowgirls get the blues” returned among other things: “kayko and kokosh”, “queens gambit”, and “Django.” This epitomizes the how broken the search feature is.  

On the positive side you can access your List; so if you do find things you are interested in watching you can save them and watch from this program.

title: I love it

review:
It’s like the makers of this app think we watch too much TV and should spend our time doing something productive. title: Downloads are messed up.
review: As of late when I have tried to download certain things for the second time it gives me the notification that it can only be downloaded one more time this year. I'm ok with that. What I’m not ok with is the fact that I have to click ok multiple times before it works, and if I cancel the download or exit the app while it is still showing the yellow exclamation point then it will say that I have reached the yearly limit when in reality I still have one more download left. It’s annoying because I like to have my shows downloaded so I can watch them on the bus and on the go. Please fix this.

title: Foreign films and Hate auto previews
review:
Overall I’m a fan of Netflix, but I wish there was a way to turn off the auto previews. It’s really distracting when I’m trying to look at the titles. 

Also, I have to be in a specific mood to watch foreign films. All too often, I’ll be browsing, read a description and find something that looks really interesting, only to find its in another language after I’ve started playing it! Can’t the language be displayed in the description? 

Thanks I’m sure no one will read this

I noticed it right away and its hard to ignore. And i know other people who have noticed it too. So I recommend that it should be fixed.

Every time I think about how I’m not going to get to watch it again for a couple years it makes me very upset. I guess friends won’t be their for me, and won’t be there for you.

When I can find a movie or show I know I’ll like, watching movies that I don’t expect to enjoy it’s always a fun surprise. Thanks, Netflix!

title: Meh
review: Netflix was pretty Not great went I started watching movies on it years ago to begin with. The system of rating was a great way to help Netflix chose movies that strike your fancy. But the rating systems been gone for quite some time. Now c minus movies are a norm. So you waste slot of time watching crappy movies with no rating. It’s a waste of time. Netflix specials are mostly meh also. So now if I’m going to watch a movie that I’m not familiar with then I have to search online to see how others have rated them. Sadly most of the movies on Netflix are 2-3 star movies. It’s no wonder they removed the rating system.

title: “Are you still watching...”
review: I like the Netflix app, I wish some shows came back but I know you can’t control that due to contracts and companies charging outrageous prices to even put the show on. Anyways, the thing that bugs me is laying in bed after putting the remote up for the night all comfy watching a tv show and “are you still watching” pops up... can you add an option to disable this or let someone pick the time length to get asked?

title: It’s ok but could be better
review: Honestly have Netflix for the offline feature and I love that it’s not limiting me to one or to movies or 12 episodes of anime I download to watch off line cause I’m always on the road no one can compare but honestly your anime selection is the only section I focus on and it limited there’s so much new anime out there and the anime I know for a fact has an English version you don’t have on here if you guys can add more anime and dubbed anime that would be appreciated much appreciated and I can cancel my Funimation account lol

title: To build English vocabulary...
review: I learn a lot of English words by watching the shows. The current challenge for me is when I come across a new word, I take a screenshot and later lookup the definition. To take the screenshot, I have to rewind 10 seconds and then have to wait 10 seconds for the new words to appear again in CC. 10 seconds feels very long...I prefer 3 seconds. It would be nice to have an option to customize it. Thank you and keep up the great work.

title: Why? Why would an update take major features away?
review:
Why do all streaming applications end up garbage? Why would Netflix suddenly fail to fill screen? Why does the sound fail to come out of the organic speakers? 

I want to see the visual field fill the phone’s screen—like it always has. I would like to be able to continue to watch something even when my AirPods are out of juice—but now the sound only comes out of the phone’s single ear-speaker. Good work, White guys.

The best part of all is the “Help” feature: if one selects the “call” function, one is connected via VoIP to general Netflix support—they cannot help at all with the mobile app.

Again: the “Help” feature connects to people whom are admittedly unable to see anything related to the app, and they cannot help in any way with the app.

I am tired of things that once worked beautifully with my iPhone X suddenly treating my amazing phone like some off-brand piece of clunky, clumsy garbage.

I am very tired of White guys.

title: Everything is Great Except
review: I wish there was an easy way to take a tv show or movie off of your continue watching list. Every time I don’t want something on my continue watch list I have to go through a bunch of extra steps. I wish there was a button that I can press to remove the unwanted tv or movie. Also the rating system needs to change back into stars.

title: It’s so good, but...
review: There are some minor changes that I would like them to make. I think that they should have more movies that stay on Netflix, I can’t tell you how many times that I look for a movie that I know is popular on Netflix and it disappears without any warning. I think there should be more profile picture selections. I think that if a movie sequel is on Netflix, the movie before t should also be there. Other that that, Netflix is a pretty good app.

title: Can't watch downloaded movies
review: I thought the whole point of making a feature where customers can download a movie was so we could watch it and not squash our data and/or have access to the movie when we don't have service...??!??? Well the app doesn't even open if you don't have service, so I spent time downloading movies so I could watch on the plane and then the app keeps bringing me to the 'sign in' page. Please fix this! Thanks

review: I have been a long time lover of Netflix. The greatest streaming service and still NO ADS! Thanks for that. But the app needs a look through. I wish you guys would put a skip forward 10 seconds button on the app. The rewind 10 seconds button is great, but I hate trying trying to grab and drag the dot to fast forward through boring parts of shows, or intros. Match that rewind button with a skip forward button for us, and this rating goes to five stars.  FOR THE LOVE OF GOD PUT A SKIP FORWARD BUTTON HERE. WHY IS THIS SUCH A HARD CONCEPT. WHY DOES THIS NOT EXIST? PUT A FREAKIN SKIP FORWARD BUTTON SO WE CAN SKIP A FEW SECONDS WITHOUT DRAGGING OUR FINGERS ON SCREEN AND NO TELLING WHERE YOU WILL LAND ONCE YOU PICK YOUR FINGER UP!!!!!

BRING BACK AIR PLAY SUPPORT

title: Casting to a chrome cast
review:
Love the app, but usability is hindered when casting to a chrome cast, as the play buttons in the upper UI portion do not work nor function when tapped - only those play buttons in the cast section/control work in the lower portion of the UI.

Suggestion for iOS product team: let the play buttons in the upper UI trigger those in the cast section seamlessly. It’s annoying to a user when tapping a button that doesn’t function as it says it does. 

Thanks!

The sound keeps cutting off a few times and it loads way too much while when I use the WiFi thing connected to Netflix my WiFi is just fine? I hope you can really fix this because it’s messing with my view time. Thank you!

review:
Netflix constantly interrupts my PAID streaming to ask “are you there?” and then the app isn’t functioning. This app makes it a pain to cast to my TV.

Update - a year later still having the same issues. Just because you’re becoming a monopoly like Comcast doesn’t mean you should stoop to their quality and customer care levels!

Update - spent over an hour on the phone with Netflix and still no resolution. They assured me their engineers read these reviews - must take over a year to fix a simple issue. They refused to disable the feature despite the long-term app issues.

title: Netflix is great... For now.

title: Awesome.......until they remove your show
review:
I love Netflix. I really do. I enjoyed Agents of Shield. I enjoyed some of Netflix’s movies. I was mad when Netflix removed Last Man Standing, but I got over it. My ANGER now is with the REMOVAL of Hawaii Five O. Hawaii Five O IS the show. I love that show! Five minutes ago, I decided to get on Netflix and watch Hawaii Five O while eating Captain D’s. I never, never, NEVER expected for Hawaii Five O to be gone. 
So.......now I ask Netflix, nicely, to PLEASE put Hawaii Five O back on your platform!!!

review: I’ve been using the app for years and it has certainly gotten better, but I really wish that Netflix can send push notifications to tell you when a certain title that you like or is in your list will be leaving Netflix. -a very aggravated writer

title: Drops out constantly
review: This app is getting worse and worse. It keeps dropping out. That means when I am casting to chrome cast the show keeps playing on the screen but it’s disconnected at the iPad. That means I have no control. I cannot connect or disconnect or fast forward or stop or play… Nothing. I have to open a different app and cast to ChromecastTo make it stop running Netflix and then go back to Netflix find my show and start over. It’s the most frustrating thing you can imagine. It used to do this every once in a while. Now it does it every few minutes.

title: Backlight flicker
review: When watching Netflix on either my iPhone or iPad, the screen flickers intermittently between strong and weak backlight (despite having set the backlight to manual in device settings). This is most noticeable when the screen is displaying a lot of black (which on the iPad is all the time because there is always a black band above and below the screen). I don’t see this flicker in other video apps so it’s apparently just a Netflix problem. Too bad there’s no way to contact Netflix support by chat on my iOS devices.

This app would be so much more awesome if they brought back Jessie and full house. Then it would be 100 stars!!!
 ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️

title: Playback controls broken in last two releases
review: In the last two releases the playback controls have serious problems. The second time I use the 30 second rewind it usually jumps back about 10 minutes. Also, the timer progress indicator now desyncs from playback and at the end of a show episode it shows I have over 10 minutes left.  This prevents the ability to get to the Play Next Episode button, and when the next episode does start, the controls don't even reflect the episode. (All this is using iOS 10 still)

title: It’s good but timing
review: This is a great app I have been using it for a year now and is has so many movies and there a lot of great movie the reason that I gave it a 4 star rating is because the only thing I don’t like is that in the US the movie come out 2-3 months after it has been released so it takes a long time for that one season u are waiting for to come out so this is my one thing that i don’t like about this app but other than that it is great

title: 2 issues
review:
I wish they would bring the star ratings back. I don’t know what a match percentage is based off, but it was a lot easier to find better movies, but also I could rate a movie and find out if I had watched it next time around. 

The thing I HATE the most are the mf foreign films. Can’t tell you how many times I tapped a movie, found out It’s not in English, and then irritatingly had to find another selection. The only way to tell if it’s. Foreign movie for the most part is to read the names of the actors

title: Disappointed with Closed Caption
review: I'm very disappointed with closed caption in English when translating from Spanish. I understand when they have to summarize it, but when they use a different name than the one actually being used, it makes me wonder for those that are watching, it is not actually being translated accurately. Please change that. Otherwise, it's annoying to have to hear one thing but read something totally different. Takes some of the enjoyment out of the movie/show.

title: Can’t search, how am I supposed to find anything?
review:
When I click on search now, there is no obvious way to type in the title of a show - just a ton of categories to browse. How am I supposed to find something specific that I want to watch if I can’t search directly for it? Please fix this ASAP.

Edit: this was fixed within a couple days and all is well now. Back up to 5 stars for me.

title: Netflix is great!
review: I could never live without Netflix, it has everything I need, and always cures my boredom. Is there an annoying baby with you? Give them Netflix, are you with a friend and it’s gotten dry? Watch Netflix, grandparents don’t understand what your saying, just watch Netflix with them! I would definitely recommend, and if you havnt gotten a subscription yet... what are you waiting for?

title: sigh

Now i deeply disagree with that decision, as well as others; I do believe that you will lose quite a lot of value and interest. A great show that everyone loves and enjoys. This particular show should stay on Netflix. Hopefully this will change your mind just the slightest and maybe come back on in the future. that’d be greatly appreciated. 

Sincerely, a person that loves The Office a lot.

title: Crashing
Please bring back the forward button
review:
I wish that you bring back the forward button.

Or at least make it available when playing back downloaded contents.

I assume you removed this function either in order to decrease the stress on your servers or to prevent viewers from skipping certain parts. In the end, it is up to us how we play back the content and I really wish that we’re given this option back.

title: Netflix is everything
review: Netflix is everything Netflix is a way to connect with loved ones it’s a way to relax it’s all way to be yourself. It’s your home away from home we are you can just sit back and unwind unwind with all these shows just fingertips away. Some people say Netflix is a way a life some might say it’s a hobby so might even say it’s in addiction I say it’s everything. Thanks you reading

title: iTunes and Netflix Account Not Active
review:
I have paid for my monthly membership via iTunes but now continually get a pop up stating that my account is no longer active. I am able to see all movie and series listings on Netflix, however when I go to watch anything I have an “inactive account”. How is that possible? I can see everything, but cannot watch. 

I have a receipt of my payment for this month. Netflix support website has nothing about account access with an iTunes subscription. I will be cancelling my subscription with Netflix and I want refund for this month as I have not been able to watch anything.

title: Bring back the rating system
review:
Whoever came up with the “% match” system should be fired. I don’t care how much of a match you guys think it is...I want to know how other users have rated it. I’m going to check Rotten Tomatoes and IMDB anyway so it would be nice to know where Netflix users have rated a movie as a baseline. Also, switching to “thumbs up” or “thumbs down” isn’t a good move either. That gives ZERO context. 

If y’all are going to raise your rates you shouldn’t reduce your usability.

title: Netflix app for iPhone used to be good
review:
Love the service, hate the iPhone app. Honestly, who thought removing the plot synopses would be a great idea? And what idiot approved it? It’s like they’re forcing you to watch their original content because the trailers for those actually offer any explanation to what the movies and shows are about. The rest of the stuff only has tags that offer no real plot details. Now I have to go on IMDb every time I browse the movie library.

Edit: JUST BRING BACK THE PLOT SYNOPSES ALREADY. HOLY CRAP, IT REALLY DOESN’T TAKE A GENIUS.

2nd Edit: ....and now genre selection is gone. Used to appear when tapping the search icon, but the idiots who made the app took that away, too.

title: Good but I have a suggestion
review: I love the new updates on NETFLIX and everything but recently Netflix took off some shows which is fine but this brought me to think about how I think it would be beneficial for NETFLIX to have some sort of section where we can recommend shows to bring back, put on or take off the app. Anyways, thanks for reading and please consider my suggestion. Bye!

title: Fast Foward & Pause Button
review: What happened to the new layout while watching on your phone? For like a week we had the pause button in the middle of the screen and you were able to double tap both sides to rewind and fast forward by ten seconds each. It was awesome! Why is it no longer like this? Could it have been my iphone update or did netflix get rid of it after only a short while??? Please explain! I want it back!

It’s a great show and I’ve watched it over five times.... and maybe for the next season the groms become seniors and ty goes to college?!! Oh and maybe lo gets in trouble again so she has to work as employee and stay with the groms (her friends) again! And fin and reef hookup! Netflix I hope you read this! And I REALLY hope you make another season for stoked!

title: Wastes space, crappy browsing. Otherwise ok
review:
This app has improved since the early days. But it still needs a lot of work. Here are my major issues:

1. After downloading a movie or episode and then deleting it, *sometimes* it doesn’t actually delete from the app, taking up space until I delete and reinstall the app.

2. Auto play is HORRIBLE. Netflix is a paid service, and I don’t want to automatically hear/see ads for your shows, or your algorithm’s crappy suggestions, or anything for that matter, unless I press play. Give us preference or option to turn OFF all auto play, please!

3. Browsing is also really crappy. I don’t *always* want to see movies/shows that are similar to what I’ve already seen. How about a category or list where I can actually...just...browse? Or maybe reverse algorithms and show me stuff that I would be *least* likely to watch? Let the customer decide!

I just wanted to know more if you guys were going to post season 10 and 11 because the cast said they’re not gonna do she’s a 12 yet they’re taking a break for it so yeah

title: User friendly but app stops working randomly
review: When it works right, I like the overall experience. I would like to have a 10 or 30-second jump forward button. But the big issues are these two problems: 1) a couple times a week, it randomly starts buffering and then just stops working or closes. 2) When looking at the Notifications on the left, I can’t scroll down to prior notifications without the app shutting down. Please fix these problems!

I think it would be wise to buy up cancelled shows from the 'Syfy' Channel. That channel always cancels shows before they finish and I'm sure a lot of sci-fi people would enjoy reboots of these shows. Like Dark Matter; Firefly, SGU, Farscape just to name a few. The only odd thing I can say is that some countries get one show while we get another. I suppose they have their reasons though.

title: I love Netflix, but
review:
My god, the download option is trash on iPhone. It constantly stops, restarts downloads, or tries to download everything all at once, which ends up everything resetting and stopping over and over.

Then, when it fails, I try again and get told I can only download one more time. DONT PUT A LIMIT ON THE DOWNLOADS IF I CANT EVEN DOWNLOAD ONCE! 

Other apps that have the download option never have this problem. I don’t get how a company like Netflix, can have such a trash app with its download option. Almost all my stuff was nearly downloaded, then it reset completely. 

Not only that, when it comes down to deleting downloads, it doesn’t or it starts trying to download again. I had avatar the last airbender redownloading over and over every time I got on the app. I shouldn’t have to delete the app, just to get rid of this data, and why is the downloading so much better on the stuff I deleted, and not the new stuff? 

Come on, fix your app.

title: I love it but,
review: Netflix is truthfully my favorite app to watch shows and movies on. But on the kids section a lot of really good movies have been removed including my favorite which is 3 tails a mermaid adventure. Please stop removing shows because when you do that you encourage people to use a different app who doesn’t remove really good movies and shows. Again I love Netflix but please stop removing shows

title: Very versatile and fun
review: The movies and shows on there are ALWAYS HD! They’re never blurry~unless you have an internet problem, of course. And most of the tv shows or movies on Netflix are things that you can only get on Netflix! There are things for people from all ages! Such as worst witch, a fantasy show! Also greenhouse academy, a mystery show with betrayals and secrets! I 1p0% highly recommend you watch this!

title: To be honest I’m only writing this review because I wanna continue my show
review: When I look it up on the internet, it says some seasons of... um.. whatever show I’m looking up OUO (by the way that’s supposed to be a little face, I do those instead of emojis :p that’s also a face) and when I go into Netflix, IT ISN’T THERE. please take care of that xd (also a little face) specifically, PLEASE FIX FLOWERING HEART I have been dying to watch season two!!! 😣 and by the way it’s a really great app and I totally recommend it.

title: Screen Mirroring Fail
review: I want to love the app, but the developers are trying to control too much. Our power went out at our house, so we don’t have access to the internal TV apps. Fortunately, technology has created a work around. Apple allows the option to Mirror my iPad screen onto the TV through Apple TV. Well, Netflix has disabled this feature and prompts an annoying message to watch the Netflix app on the TV. Um, why do you think I’m trying to Mirror? Because the TV is not available. Please stop trying to over control. There are other options besides Netflix that allow more flexibility.

title: Limited selection and nothing in English
review:
Extremely limited selection. Only things getting added to the U.S. servers aren’t in English. 
Annoying top 10 list filled with things I’ve put a thumbs down on so I don’t have to see them offered again but the “geniuses” at Netflix found a way to try to shove them down my thought again. I really do not care what other people are watching. Remove the top 10 list or give your paying customers the option to hide it.
Only good thing to say is at least there aren’t ads like prime video is forcing on their paying customers

title: Please fix!!!    Last update....
review:
I think my trouble started after the last update. I have unlimited data so a lot of times I use my cell data to download shows onto my phone to watch later. This action now, causes and error on app and unable to download. 
   However I can download on WiFi without issue. Problem, my cellular data if faster speed than my WiFi so I don’t use WiFi much when other devices are on it.

title: So hard to get any recommendations I want or search what I like
review: The bigger Netflix has grow the less it seems to offer things that interest our family. We get the same suggestions month after month after month. Even when we go in and rate them on star they don’t go away. 5 stars rarely results in them offering similar programs we enjoy. Why can’t we just say “not interested” and get rid of things we don’t care about or watched a 15 minutes and gave up on? Why get genre catalogs? Really ready for something better to come along.

title: I like it but not love it
review: This app sometimes pisses me off because they put movies and series and then take them off the app like one time they had mean girls and a long time passed and i wanted to watch mean girls again but they took it out and too you spend more time searching than actually watching and also i hope they make more romance series not just sex only but love series and they dont have much anime options also the kids thing is horrible because most of the stuff is for 4 year olds.

title: Quality and prompts
review: I love Netflix don’t get me wrong but the quality of the videos is very blurry. I really wish the quality was better for what you pay for. Also can you please have it to where we can disable the are you still watching prompt? My son loves watching tv at bed time and the shows he watches are short videos. After 3 episodes I have to constantly hit play again. That’s a nuisance at 1 in the morning.

title: Junk originals, junk programming
review: Netflix offers plenty, as long you don’t mind 95% of the selections being junk. Do the count yourself, if you have an account. For every 20 shows on Netflix, maybe there’s a single one that you’d actually consider watching. Often even less than that. And the other junky thing, if I want a show banned from my account, I can’t do it. Nevermind that has something I disagree with morally if Netflix is my entertainment pimp. There is no ban and there is very weak control based on ratings available. If you let your family watch this crud all day long, you really don’t deserve to have a family.

title: Common sense
review: The app is a great for movies and shows but I desperately need a delete button for continue watching. I accidentally clicked a show and when I exited it’s on my continue watching list! I don’t want to watch it but now it’s forever there and I can’t do anything about it. I have to watch the whole 3 seasons or at least just go through skipping to the end just to get rid of it. It would be easier for everyone if there was a delete button for the continue watching list.

title: Horrible and not worth the money
review: Netflix is charging entirely too much for me to have to continue reinstalling the app. I have called tech support and no one there seems to understand or know what to do. The guy on the phone seemed to be clueless as to what I was talking about when I told him that Netflix keeps giving me error codes. I believe if you are going to charge us this much for Netflix then our experience should be a phenomenal one. There are also times(when it is not through in error codes at me) where the video will freeze and the sound will continue to play and vise versa. GET IT TOGETHER BECAUSE I AM TIRED OF PAYING SO MUCH FOR A HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE.

title: Suggestion

review:

Error message displayed is ui-800-3, while under More details it’s displayed ui-113. TV is connected to internet as primeTV is working properly. Restart tv/app did not improve the situation. Issue is present since yesterday and updating the app today did not improve either.

title: Give or take

review:
I love Netflix!! Their selection is great. 
They have amazing Netflix original tv shows/movies that almost always wow me but, I do wish they would update the seasons more often. 
For example a show that came out in 2016 that ran 4 seasons) long should (in my opinion) be on Netflix with all 4 seasons. Us non-cable watchers would love to enjoy it on our own time. 
I travel ALOT so I cannot sit down and watch a full episode of any tv show. I take Netflix with me on my phone everywhere. I download some of my favorites for the road. It would be cool if you guys also didn’t put every movies part two and never any other versions. Like Open Season 2.. 
This would be one of my all time favorites but, I also love the first one!!  
Honestly just a thing I thought I might share.
Overall I’ve been infatuated with Netflix since day one! 
Love Tone <3

I’ve also googled this and apparently I’m not the only one dealing with this issue. I have no life and just want to get back to rewatching and binging my favorite shows while I’m still on break. title: Add passwords for accounts please

review:
Ok so to start things off, I do like this streaming service. BUT. I now have a BIG issue 
So recently I went to watch some of my fav shows, (Phineas and Ferb, and Disney shows), and THEIR GONE!!! 
Listen like I said, I like this service BUT, this is VERY upsetting. I understand that every month or so the platform restocks and takes away shows BUT these Disney shows are very popular and when you go and take them away and children who also love these shows go to see they are gone, they are going to be very upset. Which, in turn leaves the service with less users and lower profit from subscriptions. 
What I don’t understand: how can you take away the most popular kids shows and not expect a slight backlash! 
I am very upset and I would like to just say that yes, I think this service is good but, not my very fav much anymore. 

Thank you.
title: We have a problem.

review: Netflix at times is very functional but other times is dysfunctional. For instance I’m in the car leaving for vacation and I just want to watch the night shift. But Netflix won’t allow me too because of some network error. When in reality I have 3-4 bars of service. And I know it’s not my carrier because I have never had problems with them before. I have tried using it on WiFi to and even that doesn’t work. Netflix used to be a great app but lately not so much. Fix your bugs.
title: I’m having trouble...

review:
Quite simply, it boggles the mind why three years after side by side multitasking debuted, Netflix stubbornly apparently refuses to implement it.

Watching shows or a movie while browsing the news app or a website isn’t niche behavior. And Netflix forcing users to chose either to make that other app full screen and deal with a tiny viewport of Netflix floating around, or blocking half the content with slide over is simply unacceptable from a first rate company of this high caliber.  What’s the holdup?
title: Fails at providing a first rate multitasking iOS experience

review: I love Netflix and I use it almost every day. But some of the shows that are somewhat older need to have added extra episodes/seasons. I love watching the original Pokémon anime but I only have access to the first season. Except there is still the Pokémon TV app but the creators randomly choose the episodes on there. Overall still great but I would love to see the extra episodes/seasons.
title: Great but needs to add...

review: Update after update and still no useful tools to help parents manage their kids content. I’m tired of having to look up workarounds on the internet so that my kid no longer sees crappy selections of titles I don’t want her viewing. This is too simple Netflix. Just add a feature that allows parents to remove a title indefinitely. Like blocking a profile on social media, it should be forever gone until I take it off the blocked list. Simple. Y’all need to get this feature quick, because Disney will definitely have it on their streaming service, and you will be losing their content soon.
title: Still no parental controls

review:
Been a loyal Netflix user for several years now. I mostly watch on my iPhone or iPad. However (this issue has been on going for months), I can’t watch 95% of Netflix original content as only the trailer shows up when I click on the title. It will only show the trailers. I don’t have this problem if I use a desktop.

ALSO as of this week the app will loading and loading but not open the home screen and just crash. Please fix!!! :(
title: Netflix originals not showing up and app crashing

review:
Um, Netflix? Why are there adult shows in the kid’s section???
I thought it was the KIDS SECTION???? 
Listen, people: if you want to get this app for your kids, I would highly recommend that you don’t. I’m pretty sure Netflix is trying to help kids watch adult shows under their parent’s noses.
You see, on Once Upon A Time in Netflix, they say it’s PG. Just PG. And I figured it was for kids since Elsa was in a couple of the episodes. I watched one episode, decided to watch another, and... oops! There was a bad word. That was proof that Netflix had adult shows in the kids section. So people: DON’T GET THIS FOR YOUR KIDS!!!
title: Not kid-friendly!

review: The app was working fine and now after it updated, it took away the "My List" option and I can't find my list of movies anymore! It's so stupid. They want you to flounder around looking at a bunch titles you don't want to watch instead of watching the ones you actually do want to watch. Why Netflix, do you keep making things less appealing? I also liked that you could see the 5-star ratings for a movie and you just turned it into a dumb "thumbs up/down", which doesn't help and makes the selection you show an individual more narrow. Bring back My List!

title: Previews feature is annoying
review:
When browsing through titles on the Apple TV, if you pause on any title for more than a second, it begins playing a video preview. The user has made no indication that they want to see this, they may have simply stopped to read, or walked away. This is not an invitation to play unwanted video and audio. 

Please remove it or provide a preference to turn it off.

Also, since the most recent update, the “Are you still there / Continue Watching” prompt shows up a few minutes after a new title is selected manually.

title: Netflix needs a major upgrade especially with the yet another price increase coming in Dec2020

Me and my family have enjoyed Netflix since it started at $7.99 per month and now it’s almost doubled in price over the past couple of years. However their hasn’t been any significant improvement in quality. Even the content is a hit and miss.

Netflix needs to make some major upgrades especially since it’s increasing its rate yet again eff. Dec2020. Some items that I’d like to see are:

- increase content 
- allow viewers and critics to leave feedback for shows and movies like before.
- Netflix wants to keep upgrading their AI, that’s fine but let the users also leave their organic feedback. 
- if kids are watching under their own profile, they should not be able to a switch to an adult profile without supervision. A good example there is HBO. If a kid tries to switch to an adult account, it asks for a pin to be able to do so.

title: Chromecast pains
review:
I think this is a problem with the current version, because I kinda recall using this feature without a problem a few months ago. 

The in-app Chromecast control bar in the bottom is greyed out and inactive 90% of the time. I have to disconnect and reconnect to even have a chance at seeing an active control bar. Also, progress made using the Chromecast doesn’t seem to reflect in my account, as any other device ignores progress made watching on the Chromecast. 

Fix this, Netflix!

review: I have Netflix three stars because it lacks one thing. More shows! Now that I’m older I was going to watch The maze runner movies, come to find out, they weren’t on there. This upset me especially because I just watched the Maze runner Death cure. So pretty much is what I’m asking for is to put more movies on there! I hope you guys read this.

With that said, I think Netflix should have a “FaceTime” option. If my friend and I could FaceTime while watching our show live on both of our screens would be genius and definitely will get a lot of ratings. Just a thought...

It pops up with a window saying Error and then gives you the Error number. So that means I can no longer watch any of the shows I was trying to finish. Please fix this, as this is something that can ruin everyone’s experiences. Besides that, the app crashes extremely often, which makes a lot of things difficult.

title: I love it, but...
review: So I use Netflix on a regular basis, and I like watching anime, but I feel like it could use some more anime titles. I’m saying this because I like one punch man, and there is only one season on there, and there could be more shows, like dragon ball. And also most of the anime’s don’t have the second season, and I don’t use funimation or crunchyroll, so it’s kind of a bummer. Except for that, I like it, so please try to add some more anime titles and the other seasons of them!

title: Not a bad app but the keep removing good shows
review: Netflix is a semi-decent streaming service, apart from the fact that I feel their library is a little on the small side at times, I usually would see it as a good streaming service. However recently they’ve been removing some really good shows like Ouran High School Host Club and Attack on Titan for no apartment reason. I find myself very upset by the removal of the shows because I absolutely loved them. Netflix isn’t that bad of a streaming service but then again, after them continually removing shows, I’m starting to see it as one that isn’t as great as I originally thought.

title: Good but could be much better
review:
The ui is dated and klunky, and I get shown a lot of things that I have no interest in and no way to bias what I’m shown based on my interests. 

For example; less than zero interest in any horror titles, yet unable to tell Netflix “don’t show me horror titles”. By the same token, I have no way to indicate I want more “rom coms” in my gallery. 

It would also be nice to send a “watch with me” request to a friend, and have the two streams synced, as well as inset image / audio of them to share viewing experience.

title: Yo Netflix

review: I like Netflix and highly recommend. However, I signed up for a free month offer. I was billed three days later. When I contacted them they said that my account needed to be inactive for at least 10 months, which is perfectly reasonable. My gripe is that they did not make this clear when I signed up after 8 months. When I questioned them they said that the policy was stated in the Terms of Use. Maybe so. When was the last time you read a Terms of Use? It’s well worth the $8, but they should have been more transparent.
title: App is fine. Beware free offers

review:
Netflix, lots of good movies, shows and original content. Please stop the autoplay when trying to see what a selection is about. That feature drives down the my rating. 

Please make it easier to sort and find new content, half the time I do not know what I am looking for and it keeps giving me the same selections. I eventually search for a random letter and find something new that way. A designated category for Netflix originals would be great, even better if you broke it up into series and movies. Please do not hide it like it currently is.

title: NetFlix
Great
review: I love Netflix, you can watch basically anything on there. They have all episodes and seasons such as Supernatural, HayRide, The Vampire Diaries, etc. but the one thing is that the app won’t load anymore. It’s updated completely (and so is my phone) but every time I click on the app it shows that it’s loading but then it’ll shut off and go back to my home screen. Never had this problem before, so I hope it gets fixed!

title: Just Awful on an iPad Pro
review: I’m not sure how this app even gets the rating it does.  It is simply awful on on iPad Pro.  For some stupid reason the app locks up the iPad when trying to view downloaded content.  I’ve found that a hard reset will sometimes allow me to view downloads.  Most of the time if you take a time out from viewing and come back to try to view again you get the “spinning ball of death” and the program never plays.  Watching downloaded content on an airplane if virtually impossible.  Netflix is a very large company and to have an app that is this poorly written is not a good thing.

title: Last 2 updates have made problems not fixed problems for me
review:
Not sure what you guys have been doing but your last 2 updates have made Netflix completely unusable for me on my iPad. I'll click on the app, it'll give a black screen for 30 seconds up to a minute and then crash. 

Movie selection hasn't been super but I overall not big complaints there.

However, not being able to even open the app, yeah that will have me complaining. Please fix this. Thanks.

title: Good overall, but I have a problem with playback
review: This is a good app overall, but I do have a problem every once in a while where when I either pause the content or go out of it the last second of audio plays on repeat even when I close out the app. This doesn’t happen in any other app so it has to be this app. I will either have to play a video from a different app or restart my device.

title: Netflix is always removing the good anime and shows
review: No thanks to Netflix, Attack on Titan, Jojo's Bizarre adventure, OHSHC, and Hunter X Hunter are all gone. There are basically no good, quality anime on Netflix anymore which is why I have chosen to cancel my subscription. Not only that, but they took off Pretty Little Liars a while ago and it still hasn't returned. I'm sick of the prices going up when there is zero good content on Netflix. It's outrageous and ludicrous. Choose any streaming service other than Netflix. I can promise you that you won't have a good experience with this. There is absolutely hardly anything worth watching.

title: Remove rating every time I resume
review: Only thing that’s really annoying me with all streaming apps since New Years of 2021 is every single time you leave the app and then resume what you were watching it shows the rating, (as in G,PG PG-13, etc) and the reason for it, along the lines of (Nudity, Violence, Language, Etc). What I would like is the ability to use my log in credentials to turn off the constant ratings every time I resume watching.

title: Profile Lock Finally 😄🎉, but one tiny gripe 😔
review: I can’t thank Netflix enough for Profile Lock. I have been battling with family members for years about staying out of my profile and making unauthorized changes. I love the fact that I can finally lock it down, but the pin is extremely easy to retrieve. Would it be possible to add an extra layer of security to the Profile Lock feature, to the subscription owner only?

title: Suggestion
review: I love the selections of the movies and everything but one thing I find annoying is that you don’t know what language there in. The description and everything is English and then you go to watch it and it’s another language. You put the language by somewhere so we will know. title: Wonderful but.....
review: I have been on Netflix for some time now and haven’t ran into a problem, until now. I have been watching Friends recently and this is my 6 time through. And I wanted to get to the part where Chandler proposes to Monica and those episodes are season 6 episode 23 and 24. But it cuts off at episode 22 of season 6 and repeats episodes 14,15, and 16. I don’t know if this is on purpose or on accident, but I just wanted to say something about it.

title: Great but a couple of suggestions
review: I have had Netflix for a while and have come to love the app, but I have a couple of suggestions. My first one being that I dislike the subtitles appearing yellow. It’s very distracting to viewing the show/movie. Additionally I like that you can just tap now to forward or rewind 10 seconds but wish it didn’t appear so big on the screen when you go to hit the pause button. Other than those two complaints Netflix should keep up the good work

title: Love This Amazing App
review:
I love this app, but I would love if the star ratings were back that way I know ahead of time if I want to check it out and so I can rate some of my favorites. Also I know the app Netflix has never had a ten second forward button but it would be pretty sweet to have one. Overall without this app I don’t think I would survive a day without watching something from Netflix to pick up the bad days.
Thanks for the consideration 👌🏼👍🏼

title: Everything I’d hoped for! Great new features
review:
This is just about as good an app as I could possibly ask for. It looks great, the navigation is intuitive, and the video player interface makes it easy to enjoy Netflix content.

This latest update added every feature I was hoping for. It’s now possible to skip forwards ten seconds as well as back, and both can be done by double tapping the screen. The volume is now a nice discreet bar at the top of the screen instead of the enormous iphone default volume graphic covering the middle of the video.

It also looks like the horrible autoplay ads on the home page may be gone for good. I haven’t seen any for weeks. I’m very happy about that.

Thanks! I love it!

title: My problems with Netflix
review: I love Netflix and I have been telling my friends how cool it’s, but I have one problem and it make me angry. I have to download movies to Watch later and when I want to watch it’s gonna tell me that I can’t watch the movie because of some errors, I have to delete the movie to download again or stream online and it makes me sick.. title: Netflix is good but I’m not content with

title: Wow...(in a bad way)
review:
So, was on an account with my parents, they closed account.  Offer said “Free trial for a month” so decided to see if I was eligible and if it would be worth it to me on my own and figured it would tell me if I didn’t qualify.  Nope.  Said charge wouldn’t start until next month.  Ok, cool.  Wait, nope.  Charged me immediately.  Called, was told “You don’t qualify for a free month.”  End of discussion.  Wow.
Called again, got more reasonable guy (Don) who agreed that if the device was recognized it should have stopped me, not said I was getting a free trial.  Thanks Don.  Added an extra star for you.

This type of fast-paced media interaction is popular amongst the youth. You really need younger people picking what shows up on Fast Laughs to make it a success long-term.

title: Netflix please read
review: I have only 1 complaint about the app. On the surface it may seem small but in a house of 6 people I find myself raising and lowering the volume of the shows I watch constantly. Since Apple is too stubborn to fix their gigantic volume indicator in the middle of the screen, other apps have a workaround. As seen in Snapchat and Twitter, as well as iFunny and Twitch. THEY ALL REDUCE THE VOLUME INDICATOR TO A LITTLE BAR THAT DOESN’T GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR CONTENT. I understand I’m being a little dramatic here but c’mon Netflix it’s such a big oversight. Please fix.

title: netflix and KILLIN IT
review: netflix is my favorite app to watch movies, tv shows, original series' and more! i love to netflix and chill with my family (chill by eating chips on the couch not the other thing that will not be mentioned 😅) i'm in love with the OS (original series) glitter force! i have rewatched it quiet a few times! thank you for adding this! i hope you read this! keep making all those AMAZING updates! peace!✌🏽

title: Format updates
review: I loved how my app had options on the phone to skip 10 seconds ahead or even to the next episode down at the bottom of the screen. It made watching shows easier! But with the brand new update it changed the formatting for the device and I’d really like it back. I know overall I’m not the only person who misses this and Netflix should keep it as an idea to set this formatting back up.

title: New Update is the Worst
review: The new and “improved” update of Netflix won’t let me log into my account on the app. I am very annoyed. I know my password and email are correct because I can log in on Safari, but when I try the app with the exact same thing it doesn’t work. Since I use a tablet I can’t watch anything on a browser and am required to use the app to play any video. I also already tried deleting and reinstalling the app, and turning my tablet off and on again. I hope they re-update the app soon. Until then, I give them one stars for bad bugs that should definitely be avoided.

title: The app is good but there’s a few problems
review: Whenever I open the app with WiFi it will sometimes say I have no WiFi but I can go to another app that’s needs WiFi and it’ll work fine. It’s been happening more lately and it needs to be fixed. It will also sometime randomly log me out. With a recent update, it’s making it harder and harder for me to download some episodes to watch offline too. I can only have one episode downloaded at a time. They need to fix that.

title: I love Netflix
review: But I just noticed they got rid of a lot of LGBT movies they had and as a member of the LGBT community and as a paying member of Netflix I feel discriminated against. I don’t think that would honestly make me cancel my subscription but it does make me upset that such a big corporation would take a step backward in helping us LGBT community be more accepted. It’s 2018 I hope this wasn’t done to keep Christian people from canceling their subscription because they’re the most hypocrite of them all. Please bring it back!

title: Profiles don’t work
review: I love Netflix mainly because it caters to what you watch and what you like. However this app doesn’t allow me to access my profile with all my shows and movies. It only displays one of my family member’s profile. I don’t want to mess up her recommendations with the things I watch and also I want to pick up where I left off on shows. I don’t pay attention to what episode I’m on and if I’m in a profile that’s not mine then I gotta go through the guess work. Super lame.

title: Going down hill
review: I've been using Netflix for about 4 years now and since then it started going downhill and getting worse. Let's start with the fact that some good shows and movies are constantly getting deleted even shows with 4 and 5 star ratings, why do we have a limit on how many shows we can put on our list, it also crashes a lot. Y'all need to do better or you all will have 1 less user. Why in the hell are all adult swim shows getting deleted????

title: Please
review: This is more of a request then a review but I was hoping if you guys can add all the seasons and episodes to every show you guys have because I want to be able to see and finish all of the shows with all of the episodes this will also improve your app and more people would want to download it and pay for what you are giving us. THIS IS A REQUEST NOT A DEMAND. I’m not the kind of person to be mean to other people.

title: Not compatible anymore
review: I have to admit, I like Netflix. They have good shows and it’s usually pretty good about not bugging me about updates. My whole issue is that the app isn’t working anymore on IPod touch 6th generation, since its iOS can’t go beyond 12.5.1 or something to that extent. I’m not blaming Netflix, but this is so that they know, hey apple devices which can’t go past IOS 12.x need to be taken off the devices it is capable with. Great service in my opinion, just not working for me personally.

title: List suggestions
review: This app would be improved by making it easier to edit your personal List. It’s a huge pain to delete stuff. Also could be improved by adding a n “already watched” List. Where it stores everything you’ve watched so you can reference it if you want to rewatch something or want to show someone a movie that you recently watched. I know there’s a recently watched tab, but it’s often not easy to find or not accurate.

title: Dismissive attitude toward subscribers
review: The same time that they raised the fee, they stopped showing my list on my Visio app. I can see my list on my iPad app, but I can’t move titles up or down on the list. Every time they change the way an app works, it becomes less usable for the user. They want users to watch what they want us to show us. They make it difficult for us to control our own lists. And there’s no easy way to send them a message. We can speak to an agent, who only reads nonsensical answers from the script provided by their managers.

Netflix is great but downsides on the phone. There is a brightness scale to change it but It's gets annoying trying to watch something and that comes up. I don't like that when you download a Movie or a show, It expires tomorrow. Can't we leave it to stay there. The sections are to simple and more would be a lot like "Movies for teens and adults" fixing these problems would definitely make it a 5 star
title: Good but not to good

review: This app is different on every device but always seems to automatically do things you do not want it to! I want to watch the credits without it automatically skipping to some dumb preview about some other show! And what if I want to watch the intro?! Why is there no way to select that?!?! It acts as if they can do whatever they want because they have such exclusive options but there is no reason not to have a preference option setting!!!! It is EXTREMELY IRRITATING!

title: Good but...

review: Netflix was an app used to be great - from selection to subscription options. It’s not the case anymore. The selection outside the U.S is horrible while users have to pay the same price. Many local selections are seriously low-quality but it got under “Recommended”. How? Meanwhile I just want to watch good, quality shows but sadly, “Not available”. If we’re to pay the money, than either the selection has to be high quality in every region, or we are to be able to choose what we want to watch no matter which region we are currently in.
title: Not as great as it used to be

review:
I love Netflix. But why are you designing the app in such a way that I need to select my profile every time I launch app on Phone or TV?
Obviously I am the only one that uses my phone. Why do I need to select my own profile every single time I launch the app? I strongly believe that it is a bad user experience.
Again on TV, if required, I know how to switch from one profile to another. Why do I have to select the profile on TV!!

Why not launch default profile every time? 

Or why not launch previously launched profile?

Or give an option to not ask “select profile” every time so that I can check that option.

Isn’t it horrific feature where every time user selecting their profile upon launching the app?

review: My only grievance is with the continue watching section. Some finished shows/movies still remain even though they have been completed. For instance, the interactive black mirror movie adamantly refuses to go and I have tried online tips to get rid of it but the problem persists. An added feature to easily remove shows like those from continue watching along with other shows you’ve tried but didn’t enjoy would be lovely.

title: Suggestions!
review: Ok so I love this but I have two suggestions and the first one is that I think there should be more reality t.v. shows and the second one is that I think people should be able to delete stuff from their continue watching list like as an example, if there’s a show you don’t want to finish or you dislike or something you could remove it from your watch list just to save up space

They don’t really tell me anything about the show or movie. Please fix this!

title: Bandersnatch
review: While there are many streaming services to choose from, Netflix is the first (that I know of) to create and offer an interactive film: Bandersnatch.  The offering is fascinating and original in ways that I can’t go into detail without spoiling the experience.  I certainly hope they make more films with interactive features.  This, alone, is with the price of subscription.

title: Dear Netflix,
review: I love Netflix and all but there’s one little problem. I’ve been watching Riverdale which is a wonderful show by the way. And I’ve finished season 1 and season 2 so I went to find season 3 and it wasn’t there. So I updated Netflix and season 3 still wasn’t there. I also looked it up on Google and it says season 3 is on Netflix so where is it? But I will still give Netflix 5 stars❤️👍🥰

title: Netflix is getting rid of the good shows!!
review: Okay so I loved Netflix when I was younger they had so many good shows on there but now they keep getting rid of all the shows I watch and replace them with shows that are not so good. They got rid of Doctor who, Saved by the bell, Mean girls, etc. and now on the 2/19 they are getting rid of Girl Meets World. I used to be able to watch Netflix for hours and enjoy but now every time I like a show it feel like they get rid of it, every time I go on Netflix I think “what to watch” but there is nothing good to watch anymore.

title: Shtisel
review:
We watched Shtisel non-stop. We began watching reluctantly and then could not stop. We loved it!!!  So many of our friends have started watching it on our recommendation and are also hooked. It is a wonderful character study of religious people making their way with the changes and pressures of a modern society. Should be watched by all. 
We are very much looking forward to a third season!!!!

Then when you click the more button it only shows ‘App Settings’ ‘Privacy’ ‘Help’ then ‘Sign Out’. There’s no other way to get to the “my account” button. Or anything else that’s not the 4 I listed that was there.

title: The Green Screen
review: Whenever I watch a movie or show, my screen turns bright green at random parts and I can no longer see the show/movie I'm watching. Even though I can't see the screen, I can still hear the words so I know it's still playing. I've tried to fix it by rewinding to a part where there was no problem, but as soon as I come back to the scene, the green screen still appears. It doesn't just happen once every episode, it happen quite a few times. Other than this problem the app works pretty well.

title: Poor rating system but good collection
review:
With a large number of shows and movies to watch it’s a shame that Netflix has gotten rid of the 5 star rating system that allowed us all to rate what we watched. The new thumbs up/down system does nothing to help find other things to watch as shows that have a “97% match” are often not worth watching and those sitting around 50% are spectacular. 
Why delete the old rating system that allowed us to see whether a show was worth watching based on what other people thought?
